page.popupBody:
Intro: Select this tab to review the Introduction screen.
Your Task: Select this tab to review your task in this simulation.
Scenario: Select this tab to read the scenario.
Decision: Select this tab to move to the question screens.
This will not be available till you have visited all previous tabs.
Feedback: Select this tab to review your performance. This tab will not be available till you have answered all questions for a Round of simulation play.
How to Proceed: Select this button to know what to do in each question.
Navigate: Select this button to open the navigation help screen.
OER: Select this button to open the list of Open Educational Resources.
Screen buttons: Select each button to know more about the particular company or access helpful tools.
Question Numbers: Select the number buttons to revisit questions you have already attempted. Remember, you cannot move to the next question before answering the previous question.
Submit: Select the Submit button after you have made your selection.
Remember that once you submit your decision, you cannot change it in this round.
Select these buttons to move back and next between related questions.
Round: Select this tab to see the specific feedback for a Round of simulation play.
Resource links: Select a link to open the resource screen in a new window.
Remember, in order to proceed in the module, you need to visit all resources suggested in the parameter feedback.
Each module will have its own set of specific online resources pertinent to the simulation topic.
Exit: Select this button to quit the simulation. Remember, if you quit in the middle of a cycle, you will lose your data. You will need to answer all questions again. If you quit on reaching the Feedback screen, your data will be saved.
